text:
Hello,

I've registered a new MIME type for WordPerfect documents:
application/vnd.wordperfect (this supercedes application/wordeperfect5.1).
Please see
<http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/application/vnd.wordperfect>.

Can you add this to mime.types and associate it with the .wpd extension? Thanks...
creator: sluggo@unknown.nu

text:
At Apachecon it was suggested to me that I comment on this bug to try to get
somebody to look at it. So I am. Can this please be added to the MIME types file?
creator: sluggo@unknown.nu

text:
I've attached a diff to bug 26505 which should update both the WordPerfect and
Palm OS media types.
creator: dmh@dmh.org.uk
